entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
